subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger, Michael Jordan and Justin Timberlake will be joined by a yet-to-be-determined amateur golfer in the 2009 Golf Digest U.S. Open Challenge.
snippet: Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger, Michael Jordan and Justin Timberlake will be joined by a yet-to-be-determined amateur golfer in the 2009 Golf Digest U.S. Open Challenge.
